script.title: cs-time-based-filters.slax
script.author: curtisstephencall
script.synopsis: This time-based filter script will automatically execute at the start and stop times specified and will activate or deactivate the firewall terms whose state should be changed.
script.description: Companion to time-based-filters.slax event script. These two scripts can be used together to cause firewall filters to be activated and deactivated at configured times.
